author: adammbq
content: when l2 transactions are compressed and batched then sent to L1 as CALLDATA, how can one (who?) run checks if a L2 state transition is valid?

author: sky.cactus
content: Note: it is all theoretical.  At the moment, all used L2s have strictly worse security than L1.

author: sky.cactus
content: That is, they have all of the risk of the L1 plus L2 risks on top.
